data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Export Document Invoice Item'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
serviceQuality: #X,
sizeCategory: #S,
dataClass: #MIXED
}
define root view entity ZETR_DDL_I_EXPORT_INVOICE_ITEM

  as select from    I_BillingDocumentItemBasic as DocumentItem

    left outer join I_Plant                    as Plant            on Plant.Plant = DocumentItem.Plant
    left outer join I_StorageLocation          as StorageLocation  on  StorageLocation.Plant           = DocumentItem.Plant
                                                                   and StorageLocation.StorageLocation = DocumentItem.StorageLocation
    left outer join I_ShippingPointText        as ShippingPoint    on  ShippingPoint.Language      = $session.system_language
                                                                   and ShippingPoint.ShippingPoint = DocumentItem.ShippingPoint
  /** left outer join maw1 on DocumentItem.Product = maw1.matnr
  left outer join nsdm_v_marc as marc on DocumentItem.Product = marc.matnr
  and DocumentItem.Plant = marc.werks
  left outer join I_CountryText as CountryText on CountryText.Language = $session.system_language
  and CountryText.Country = maw1.wherl
  left outer join I_CountryText as CountryTextC on CountryTextC.Language = $session.system_language
  and CountryTextC.Country = marc.herkl **/
    left outer join I_DeliveryDocument         as DeliveryDocument on DocumentItem.ReferenceSDDocument = DeliveryDocument.DeliveryDocument
    left outer join I_Customer                 as Customer         on Customer.Customer = DeliveryDocument.ShipToParty

{
  key DocumentItem.BillingDocument,
  key DocumentItem.BillingDocumentItem,
      DocumentItem.HigherLevelItem,
      DocumentItem.HigherLvlItmOfBatSpltItm,
      DocumentItem.Product,
      DocumentItem.BillingDocumentItemText,
      /** coalesce( maw1.wherl, marc.herkl ) as wherl,
      coalesce( CountryText.CountryShortName, CountryTextC.CountryShortName ) as wherl_txt,
      coalesce( maw1.wstaw, marc.stawn ) as wstaw,**/
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'BillingQuantityUnit'
      DocumentItem.BillingQuantity,
      DocumentItem.BillingQuantityUnit,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'ItemWeightUnit'
      DocumentItem.ItemGrossWeight,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'ItemWeightUnit'
      DocumentItem.ItemNetWeight,
      DocumentItem.ItemWeightUnit,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'ItemVolumeUnit'
      DocumentItem.ItemVolume,
      DocumentItem.ItemVolumeUnit,
      DocumentItem.TransactionCurrency,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      DocumentItem.NetAmount,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      DocumentItem.TaxAmount,
      DocumentItem.Batch,
      DocumentItem.Plant,
      Plant.PlantName,
      DocumentItem.StorageLocation,
      StorageLocation.StorageLocationName,
      DocumentItem.ShippingPoint,
      ShippingPoint.ShippingPointName,
      DocumentItem.SalesDocument,
      DocumentItem.SalesDocumentItem,
      DocumentItem.ReferenceSDDocument,
      DocumentItem.ReferenceSDDocumentItem,
      DeliveryDocument.ShipToParty, //as kunwe,
      Customer.OrganizationBPName1 //as namwe
}
/*+[internal] {

],
